/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with buildings and trees, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The buildings, primarily in shades of red and brown, rise up on either side of the street, their colors contrasting with the greenery that punctuates the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
